name: LPMD_S_XML_POWER_DEF_0
summary: Verify change default xml configuration to enable opportunistic Low Power Mode enter/exit by setting 0 in <PerformanceDef>-1</PerformanceDef>,<BalancedDef>0</BalancedDef>,<PowersaverDef>1</PowersaverDef>, to perform low power mode force enter, force exit, auto enter lpm, survivability mode enter, survivability mode exit and terminate, then verify if opportunistic Low Power Mode pattern (usr auto && SYS util) is detected, verify if all the activity patterns are correct from debug logs
